scripts.dev: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm --recursive --filter=./packages/* run dev
scripts.watch:shared: pnpm run clean:shared && pnpm --recursive --filter=./shared/* run watch
scripts.build: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run build:packages
scripts.build:packages: pnpm run clean:packages && pnpm --recursive --filter=./packages/* run build
scripts.build:shared: pnpm run clean:shared && pnpm --recursive --filter=./shared/* run build
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:packages && pnpm run clean:shared
scripts.clean:shared: pnpm run clean:packages && pnpm --recursive --filter=./shared/* run clean
scripts.clean:modules: pnpm run clean:modules:packages && pnpm run clean:modules:shared
scripts.clean:modules:packages: pnpm run clean:packages && pnpm --recursive --filter=./packages/* run clean:modules
scripts.clean:modules:shared: pnpm run clean:shared && pnpm --recursive --filter=./shared/* run clean:modules
